## ProgramBuilder.defineStructByType() method

Defines a structure type

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  structType | [PBStructTypeInfo](doc/markdown/./device.pbstructtypeinfo.md) | The structure type info |
